entry.title: 2013è‹±äºŒå°çŸ­æ–‡
entry.content:
â€‹ I can pick a date from the past 53 years and know instantly where I was, what happened in the news and even the day of the week. Iâ€™ve been able to do this since I was four.

â€‹I never feel overwhelmed with the amount of information my brain absorbs. My mind seems to be able to cope and the information is stored wasy neatly. When I think of a sad memory, I do what everyone doesâ€”â€”try to put it to one side. I donâ€™t think itâ€™s harder for me just became my memory is clearer. Powerful memory doesnâ€™t make my emotions any more acute or vived. I can recall the day my grandfather died and the sadness I felt when we went to the hospital the day before. I also remember that musical play Hair opened on the Broadway on the same dayâ€”â€”they both just pop into my mind in the same way.
